name: Wind Slash
description: A swift attack that cuts through the air to damage enemies.

name: Gleaming Dash
description: A dazzling move that boosts evasion and attacks swiftly.

name: Flame Surge
description: A fiery blast that scorches enemies in its path.

name: Molten Shield
description: A shield of lava that defends against attacks.

name: Lunar Strike
description: A powerful strike imbued with lunar energy.

name: Arcane Shield
description: A magical shield that absorbs damage.

name: Inferno Roar
description: A ferocious roar that engulfs enemies in flames.

name: Frozen Shield
description: A shield of ice that blocks attacks.

name: Frost Barrage
description: An icy assault that slows and damages enemies.

name: Glacial Barrier
description: A barrier of frost that reduces incoming damage.
